attacks.name: Discharge
attacks.effect: Discard all Lightning Energy attached to Rotom. Flip a coin for each Energy card you discarded. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Uproar
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
